subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Ancient simplification of {{och-l|䨮}}, which is in turn {{Han compound|雨|彗|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Starostin compared this with {{cog|bo|སད||frost, cold air, cold, coldness}}. This may be unlikely considering the phonetic part of this character.
